definitions.definition: used to refer to the largest size of meal or drink available in a fast food restaurant

examples: Unhealthy food is producing supersized kids.

definitions.definition: to give a customer in a fast food restaurant the largest size of meal or drink:
examples: "A burger and a Coke please." "Can I supersize it for you?"

definitions.definition: to increase a lot in size, or to make something increase a lot in size:
examples: We offer tips on how to supersize your business.
